Articles.Content: Has anyone ever created magnetic objects for ksp?
Kerbal Attachment System Mod has electro magnets.

KAS (kerbal attachment system) like Moon mentioned has magnet...

also

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/23774-0-20-2-Hooligan-Labs-New-Heavy-Lift-Airship

Look at the SQUID lander legs...it comes with same effect in 2 structural panels too(squid is 3rd spacepoert link down I think...gotta scoll though some pics)
Well I guess I mean where you can attract one ship to another within a certain distance.

Well I guess I mean where you can attract one ship to another within a certain distance.

Again, that's docking ports. They're made to be weak, though.
Check romfarer's Lazor mod. I dimly remember there was talk about 'tractor beams' in package.

Check romfarer's Lazor mod. I dimly remember there was talk about 'tractor beams' in package.

They do have one in the pack never could get it to work just right but i gave up after only a few minutes XD.

But We at Outlaw Creations are working on a magnetic system
If you are looking for realistic magnets it's the docking ports or KAS, if your looking for sci fi, only one I know is laser mod.
